name: Date Run Boy Free
description: Date Run Boy is a FREE, simple and funny infinite running game. This valentine we are presenting the best running game for lovers. You are a handsome guy and you have to meet your beauty girl nearby town. Start running to her, collect gifts for her and dodge the obstacles coming in your way. You will get rewarded with accessories like cap, shoes and jackets after each particular distance. In your way you will get skates to run fast. Run for your date; avoid holes, dogs and bulls, as they are the great obstacles between you and your love. Don’t worry if you lose a life, there will health to put you again on the track, you just have to collect it while running. You have to try hard to meet your beloved. Have a lovely valentine day.
